xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: RecentlyUpdated

contentDescription.name: contentDescription
contentDescription.prettyName: Content description (Not applicable for "No content" type)

property.code:
{{include reference="Confluence.Macros.RecentlyUpdatedService" /}} {{velocity output="false"}} ## ----------------------------------------------------------------- ## ----------------------------------------------------------------- ## ----------------------------------------------------------------- ## Parameter formatting macros ## ----------------------------------------------------------------- ## Format serialized comma-separated types list coming from macro parameters ## Return a list containing all the types of results that need to be displayed #macro (parseTypes $serializedTypeList $return) #set ($types = []) #set ($typesDiscarded = []) #set ($splittedTypeList = $!stringtool.split($serializedTypeList, ',')) ## Gather types based on wheter they are kept or discarded #foreach ($type in $splittedTypeList) #set ($type = $!stringtool.strip($type)) #if ($type.startsWith('-')) #set ($usedTypeList = $typesDiscarded) #set ($type = $!stringtool.substring($type, 1)) #else #set ($usedTypeList = $types) #end #if ($type.equals('page')) #set ($discard = $usedTypeList.add('page')) #elseif ($type.equals('blogpost') || $type.equals('news')) #set ($discard = $usedTypeList.add('blogpost')) #elseif ($type.equals('attachment')) #set ($discard = $usedTypeList.add('attachment')) #elseif ($type.equals('comment')) #set ($discard = $usedTypeList.add('comment')) #end #end ## Compute types to return #if ($types.size() == 0) #set ($types = $TYPES.clone()) #end #set ($discard = $types.removeAll($typesDiscarded)) ## Return #set ($return = $NULL) #setVariable("$return" $types) #end ## Creates the final space parameter. ConfluenceSpaces comes from migreations and is a mix of prefixed(+/-) spaces and excludedSpaces comes ## from XWiki and are the spaces that should be excluded when doing the solr query. #macro (constructSpaceParameter $confluenceSpaces, $excludedSpaces) #set ($exclude = "") #foreach ($excludedSpace in $excludedSpaces.split(",")) #if (!$excludedSpace.trim().isBlank()) #if ($foreach.first) #set ($exclude = "-$excludedSpace") #else #set ($exclude = "$exclude,-$excludedSpace") #end #end #end #if (!$confluenceSpaces.trim().isEmpty() && !$exclude.trim().isEmpty()) #set ($finalSpace = "${confluenceSpaces},${exclude}") #elseif(!$confluenceSpaces.trim().isEmpty()) #set ($finalSpace = $confluenceSpaces) #else #set ($finalSpace = $exclude) #end #end ## Determine if the search should be done in the currentWiki, globally or only on specific spaces. #macro (determinateSpaceScope $confluenceSpacesString) ## If the global parameter is marked then we set the search to everywhere, if the currentWiki is marked then we select the current wiki ## otherwise we just the actual space selected. #if ($xcontext.macro.params.global == "true") #set ($confluenceSpacesString = '@all') #elseif ($xcontext.macro.params.currentWiki == "true") #set ($confluenceSpacesString = '@global') #end #end ## Handles the construction of the tags parameter. #macro (constructTagsParameter $confluenceTags, $excludedTags) #set ($exclude = "") #foreach ($excludedSpace in $excludedTags.split(",")) #if (!$excludedSpace.trim().isBlank()) #if ($foreach.first) #set ($exclude = "-$excludedSpace") #else #set ($exclude = "$exclude,-$excludedSpace") #end #end #end #if (!$confluenceTags.trim().isEmpty() && !$exclude.trim().isEmpty()) #set ($finalTags = "${confluenceTags},${exclude}") #elseif (!$confluenceTags.trim().isEmpty()) #set ($finalTags = $confluenceTags) #else #set ($finalTags = $exclude) #end #end ## Init options from macro parameters #macro (initOptionsFromParameters $return) ## Gather every parameter in an option object that will be returned #set ($options = {}) ## Gather some data to be send to the client to be cached #set ($options.typesMetadata = {}) #foreach ($type in $TYPES) #set ($discard = $options.typesMetadata.put("$type", {})) #end ## Authors #set ($options.authors = "$!stringtool.strip($!stringtool.join($!wikimacro.parameters.author, ','))") ## Wiki & Spaces #set ($excludedSpaces = "$!xcontext.macro.params.excludedSpaces") #set ($confluenceSpacesString = "$!stringtool.strip($!xcontext.macro.params.spaces)") #set ($options.spaces = $NULL) #set ($options.wiki = $doc.wiki) #determinateSpaceScope($confluenceSpacesString) #if ( $confluenceSpacesString.equals('') || $confluenceSpacesString.equals('@self') ) ## Search in current space ## Newly migrated content don't have @self, see https://jira.xwiki.org/projects/CONFLUENCE/issues/CONFLUENCE-236 #set ($options.spaces = $doc.space) #elseif ( $confluenceSpacesString.equals('@global') || $confluenceSpacesString.equals('@personal') || $confluenceSpacesString.equals('@favorite') || $confluenceSpacesString.equals('@favourite') ) ## Search everywhere in current wiki ## `@personal`, `@favorite` and `@favourite` do not have an equivalent in XWiki, ## so make them fallback as `@global` #set ($options.wiki = $doc.wiki) #elseif ( $confluenceSpacesString.equals('@all') || $confluenceSpacesString.equals('*') ) ## Search everywhere in every wikis #set ($options.wiki = $NULL) #else ## Search in specified spaces #constructSpaceParameter($confluenceSpacesString, $excludedSpaces) #set ($options.spaces = $finalSpace) #end ## Tags #constructTagsParameter("$!stringtool.strip($!xcontext.macro.params.labels)", "$!stringtool.strip($!xcontext.macro.params.excludedLabels)") #set ($options.tags = $finalTags) ## Types #set ($confluenceTypesString = "$!stringtool.strip($!xcontext.macro.params.types)") #parseTypes($confluenceTypesString, $types) #set ($options.types = $types) ## Offset & Limit #set ($offset = 0) #set ($options.offset = $offset) #set ($limit = $!wikimacro.parameters.max) #set ($options.limit = $limit) ## Theme #set ($availableTheme = ['concise', 'social', 'sidebar']) #set ($options.theme = "$!stringtool.strip($!wikimacro.parameters.theme)") #if (!$availableTheme.contains($options.theme)) #set ($options.theme = 'concise') #end ## showProfilePic #set ($confluenceShowProfilePic = "$!wikimacro.parameters.showProfilePic") #if ("$confluenceShowProfilePic" == "false" && $options.theme == 'social') #set ($options.showProfilePic = false) #elseif ("$confluenceShowProfilePic" == "true" || $options.theme == 'social') #set ($options.showProfilePic = true) #else #set ($options.showProfilePic = false) #end ## Return #set ($return = $NULL) #setVariable("$return" $options) #end #macro (executeMacro) ## ----------------------------------------------------------------- ## ----------------------------------------------------------------- ## ----------------------------------------------------------------- ## Fetch results ## ----------------------------------------------------------------- $xwiki.ssx.use('xwiki:Confluence.Macros.RecentlyUpdated') $xwiki.jsx.use('xwiki:Confluence.Macros.RecentlyUpdated') {{html clean="false"}} #initOptionsFromParameters($options) #fetchResults($options, $results) #set ($confluenceWidth = $escapetool.xml($wikimacro.parameters.width)) #set ($widthStyle = "style='--width: $confluenceWidth'")
#if ("$wikimacro.parameters.hideHeading" != "true")

$escapetool.xml($services.localization.render('recentlyUpdatedMacro.title'))

#end
    #displayResults($results $options)
{{/html}} #end {{/velocity}} {{velocity}} ## We need to check if there is a valid license because the macro is registered even if the user doesn't have view right ## on the macro definition page. See XWIKI-14828: Rendering macros defined in wiki pages are available to users that ## don't have view right on those pages. #if ($services.promacrolicensing.hasLicensureForEntity($xcontext.macro.doc.documentReference)) #executeMacro #else {{missingLicenseMessage extensionName="proMacros.extension.name"/}} #end {{/velocity}}
